Package rekit.logic

Interface ILevelScene

All Superinterfaces:
IScene
All Known Implementing Classes:
LevelScene
public interface ILevelScene extends IScene
This interface extends IScene and adds necessary methods to encapsulate Levels.
Author:
Matthias Schmitt
